website_summaries.verdict: An elegant espresso-finished buffet table with ample storage space for a range of purposes.
pros: Features storage options for flatware, linen, and more
It even comes with a built-in wine rack with space for nine bottles
cons: Back of the countertop is unfinished in laminate, and might look unsightly unless backed up to a wall

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money...
customer_reviews.text: I gave two stars for the wood which is solid compared to others. But for the money I am not happy with the purchase. As you can see the attached picture the top piece was not finished which eventually led to the damage of the whole piece also it looks stupid unless you are not hiding that beside the wall. As you can see in the second picture the bottles will be projected outside the cabinet a lot which I dont like.
customer_reviews.author: James J

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the price. Looks sharp in our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Julia McBride

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Buffet. Complicated Assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dining buffet. It will add class and elegance to any setting. It is made of great quality materials and feels extremely sturdy and well designed. The section for storing wine bottles is a bit short, so regular wine bottles with stick out a bit. The included instructions were ok. This will take a time to assemble, as there are alot of parts and steps. I have assembled many different kinds of furniture including bookshelves, desks, tables, shelving, exercise equipment and storage units; and this assembly to longer than anything else I have ever assembled. Overall, this is the nicest buffet that I could find at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked the design/material, but process to put together was not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The material itself was ok and the design looked much better in person. However, putting it together was a pain. Holes were either not big enough for certain holes for designated screws were not big enough so you had to work on it first. You definitely may need 2 people to help put together. I did it myself and my husband will have to help me re-do bc the top side part (of the legs) were popping out of the structure once you have it standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of hours to put together between 2 ppl. Very easy to put together. It's beautiful. It's simply elegant. Goes great with my dark wood counter height dinning table. I was originally going to place it behind dinning table but decided it was too beautiful to be out of sight. I am EXTREMELY happy with this purchase. The style of the legs even goes with my dinning table. It was worth the wait, since it was out of stock when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new entertainment center for quite some time and so glad I found this buffet! We don't have alot of electronics so all the pieces I was finding were too elaborate and too pricey. We did not 'install'the wine rack part, left that open. It seems very sturdy and should last a long time. Very pleased with this, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Great! Absoluately love.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Very cute and well made. I think the dimensions are bigger than they say. I thought I read somewhere it was lengthwise 51 inches but it is definitely probably closer to 60-65. Still, so cute! It took about 30-45 minutes for me (a girl with very little experience in Ikea furniture) to put together alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged furniture, but still keeping it because I assembled most of it! Too large to return
customer_reviews.text: I am a little mad about this. As I was assembling it, I noticed that the top most visible part had a huge dent. I had already assembled most of it (it took me many hours!), so I do not want to take the time to return it. Also its pretty heavy! I wish that they could send me just that top piece :( Otherwise the furniture is excellent its really pretty and looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in any room
customer_reviews.text: I love the modern design. It is well made and sturdy. Fairly easy to put together. It looks beautiful in my living room with some of my favorite sculpture on it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie998

customer_reviews.title: Great buffet table
customer_reviews.text: This item is the perfect buffet side table for my fairly small condo. I needed more storage for my ill equipped kitchen and this did the trick pretty well. I am able to store many bottles of wine and glasses and entertaining essentials. Plus it's a beautiful piece of furniture enhancing my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because it is a nice, heavy piece of furniture especially for the price. I took a star away because the assembly instructions are horrible. They are just pictures and it is very east to make a mistake -which I did - and end up with the open shelf upside down. Otherwise it took a long time to put together but it does look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited about this table! It was very easy to put together, instructions were clear and sensible. My only complaint is that the pre-drilled holes and tiny screws to secure the magnet to the cabinet doors didn’t cooperate well with my little tools so I’d recommend using a drill particularly for that part, and if you want to do it faster. But it is absolutely beautiful once put together.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful buffet; however
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful buffet; however, the reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it was such a pain to put together. I dont know if it was my shipment, but some of the holes were off, and I had to drill holes in the correct places in order to put it together. It took me 4 hours by myself, and I'm pretty good at putting furniture together. So it was a bit of a headache. Otherwise, it is a beautiful piece of furniture and really brings everything in my dining room together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood piece. Not too hard to put together. Looks amazing in my dining area. Looks much more expensive than I paid! This was a great choice and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture but very hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this buffet, but it was so hard to assemble, I have put together a few things before, but this was the hardest (idk how people can review that it was easy unless they are a handyman). However, when completed (2 hrs later) it was gorgeous, a little bigger than expected but it makes it look even more expensive. Oh, and one of the knobs was broken and just dangles there, and there is no number for new parts, I will probably have to go buy new drawer knobs. Overall, I love it and if you know someone to help you assemble it you should def buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece. Heavy construction and it wasn't terrible to put together. I recommend 2 people put it together just due to the weight of the item. It looks great and looks like we paid much more for the item. Arrived well packaged so there were no issues. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Justanothermother

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece, it looks very elegant. One door's magnet is weaker than another one but it's a minor thing. Assembly was not very complicated from what I understood
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: we use this in our dining room to store plates and other things and it looks lovely! Had it for about a year or two and no signs of wear or tear! great!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews prior to purchasing this buffet, i was on the fence in regards to buying it. BUT, what I can say is that I am VERY happy I made this purchase based on the positive reviews. This piece of furniture is PERFECT! I am extremely happy with my choice. All pieces fit, I was not missing anything and it didn't come scratched or damaged. I personally highly recommend this piece of furniture. I would purchase it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Elyea H.

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much except the top has some imperfections ...
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much except the top has some imperfections (stained over glue or something) that won't come off. It's minor, and I can live with it. Otherwise easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece, Lousy Instructions!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the piece a lot, but the instructions leave a lot to be desired. Screws and such aren't properly marked and pictures don't show all points when putting together, more than twice I thought I put things on the wrong way, when I had them correctly in.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Savini

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Impressed with shipping packaging! Arrived without anything broken. The color is exactly as stated. Great quality for the price. I highly recommend this company. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Becky N

customer_reviews.title: I've had it a while and it one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a while and it one of the most complimented features in my "fan cave". I had problems with the assembly instructions, and actually installed one horizontal piece upside down. The markings are not idiot proof (made in China).
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my dinning room. I’m pregnant and in my 3rd trimester and I put this together by myself in maybe 2 hours...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my coffee bar and absolutely LOVE it! I is solid, very sturdy, and stylish. I've had so many compliments on it and it's the perfect size. True to color too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: this piece is amazing. well built. my brother put it together for me with little difficulty
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Product. Price. Service. What more can we ask for!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. Solid material. Got it fast. Very well packaged. Easy to put together. Will defenitly order from this company again. Happy wife, Happy life:)
customer_reviews.author: nyctx

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee bar!
customer_reviews.text: This took about 2 hours to put together. I did it myself although it would have been easier with another person to help. I had a little trouble putting the cupboard doors end until I figured out that one of the little hinge doohickeys was retractable.you definitely would want to keep the back side to the wall as it's ugly. There's lots of storage inside and it cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Not hard to assemble, has looked great for years.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived damaged. We were able to fix ...
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived damaged. We were able to fix the damaged part and continued to put together. When finished we were surprised that the tops of screws were visible on the top of the cabinet level. I will be returning and never purchase furniture from here again!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... a very long time to build and it looks nice, but the instructions were unclear at some points ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a very long time to build and it looks nice, but the instructions were unclear at some points and some of the items were broken, especially many of the small nails.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W

customer_reviews.title: could be a great product, but assembly instructions WERE NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: could be a great product, but assembly instructions WERE NOT INCLUDED. so I have lots of heavy wooden squares with no idea how to put them together. Such a simple, simple oversight, but such a grave mistake that its evidence of a pretty poor supply company. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: There was a dent in it should have gotten a discount and it was very difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: gene denson

customer_reviews.title: Fancy for a poor lady like me :)
customer_reviews.text: For this price it shouldnt be a shocker that its not the best quality furniture but when your poor but want to feel fancy this is the way to go. It took probably 2 hours but im sure it could be faster if i wasnt watching shows :) So far its holding up looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design. Looks good though
customer_reviews.text: The leg assembly is too cumbersome and if you make a mistake putting the doors, you have to dissamble the unit to get the doors out. Very poor design. Looks good though.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio E.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely reccommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and matched perfect with my kitchen table that is not from the same manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gustin

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nicely made for the price. Took about an hour to get her together. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Merf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my apt - it fits right between the dining and living rooms. I can say I really, really like the piece, but after putting it together, not real wood, not the best wood composite and should not cost as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for the space, hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Wrong screws were provided, so had to go out and buy new ones then one of the legs and middle piece didn't fit and had to be sanded down. Lot more work than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buffet Unit !
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect ! Easy to assemble and matches perfect with the dinning room furniture ! Totally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband had it put together by himself in an hour or so-very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described. My husband had it put together by himself in an hour or so-very easy to assemble. We use it as a little espresso bar/station in our kitchen, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Looks great in my dining area.
customer_reviews.author: Tenedora4

customer_reviews.title: Don’t  waste  your money
customer_reviews.text: For the price no what I expect I can buy similar product in ikea for less money
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I had been looking around for a bar table for our condo for quite a while. When we came across this table, we both hoped it would match our other furniture and also suit the space. When it did arrive, it was very easy to put together and we had it assembled within an hour! It matched our other dark wooded furniture PERFECTLY and looks great in our condo! We were both very happy with the quality and appearance and are so happy we purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Fiffy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: You will need help putting this together, the instructions were included int his one and it went a bit faster than the other, but it takes time patience and I would suggest an electric screw driver!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the piece but unfortunately I wouldn't be able to finish the assamble because the one of the legs #12, came without the caps that holds the screws. I prefer a replacement just for the leg rather than return the buffet table. Can the seller help me on this?
customer_reviews.author: Ligia Medina

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great for that price. It looks great in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this buffet. It goes very well with what I was looking for. Easy to put together. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Charleen

customer_reviews.title: It is a great piece. I am able to have my china ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great piece. I am able to have my china out in the open now. The only issue i have is some screws dont match color of wood and arent hidden well and be sure to use the wood glue to secure the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. However the real high measure is 33" but overall is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful buffet
customer_reviews.text: This buffet is heavy and well made. The style is beautiful. I could have put it together by myself easily, but I had my boyfriend help. It took us about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: LoraLee

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece for my formal dining room
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite! Love this piece for my formal dining room. Easy to assemble according to my 21yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced with luxury feel at an affordable price level.
customer_reviews.text: The top has some texture to it, goes well with my other furniture. Good sturdy dining buffet perfect for various uses.
customer_reviews.author: RhinoCNC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful. Have gotten many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Have gotten many compliments. Definitely a great buy. Color just as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery very nice looks great in my apartment good quality 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: I was a little nervous about putting it together but it was simple and easy and came out looking great
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by this product. I was a little nervous about putting it together but it was simple and easy and came out looking great. I love the finished product and am very impressed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly, slightly smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of the side table was fairly straightforward, even for one person. I was able to piece it together alone and it seems sturdy enough to accommodate my wine and wine glasses. The color was not as dark as I was expecting it to be and it was slightly smaller than the dimensions provided by an inch or two, so only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coffee Bar
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a buffet that was big enough to create a coffee bar in my kitchen, I have my keruig, creamers, pod holders, etc.. the tables I had found in stores that I liked were over $500.00, I finally found this one and liked the look of it, hubby said it was pretty easy to put together ( he is a picture guy, if you know what I mean) I love the color and it looks like an expensive piece of furniture. The storage underneath is perfect for extra coffee supplies and the wine rack holds our favorite wines. Every visitor loves my coffee bar and wants to create them one, so happy I found it....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together, even for a novice like me. Looks great and is very sturdy. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Hettinger Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Finishes my kitchen nicely
customer_reviews.text: I love how pretty it is and it's great once its put together. It took my fiance and I 2 hours to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table, doesn't really look like wood
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table, doesn't really look like wood, but all in all a great piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color! My husband had it put together within 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition and actually looks like it came with my dining set
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: If you're not used to assembling things from the box ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're not used to assembling things from the box, it might be a small battle for you. But the finished product will be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Im always very picky buying furniture and 99.9% of the time i have to see it with my own eyes before i buy, but i was looking for an specific piece for my dinner set and this one was perfect!!! So I had to take my changes and needless to say, i love this piece it looks amazing, great quality and it stands out. Just Perfect...
customer_reviews.author: cpscowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, looks just as advertised. Also bought a table to match.
customer_reviews.author: C S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered way earlier than expected and packed perfectly. I couldn't wait for my hubby to come home so I put this together on my own 4 months pregnant, it did take 3 hours but it was really easy. Love my new buffet!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Millette

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i love it, it was easy to assemble, and looks great. you really get your monies worth with this product.
customer_reviews.author: sharon robinson

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy. It looks nice in our formal dining room. Can be assembled in about an hour and a half
customer_reviews.author: Roderick L. Pommier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture, small assembly details
customer_reviews.text: I'm Mostly satisfied with this purchase, good material, beauty color and shape. Just couple of details: 1- Missing a couple of screws, specially designed screws used to assemble using a self locking mechanism, had to make some changes to finalize the assembly. 2- There are like 10 screw heads (silver color) used to hold the base in the middle (were the white tableware is in the picture) that are exposed and there's nothing provided to cover them, I will have to use some paint because they are evident. In General I will recommend this Buffet.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the top warped and cracked within a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tregoning

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering furniture and having it arrive broken. This piece arrived in excellent condition and looks amazing. It was easy to put together, can wait to get some wine in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I had been looking for a buffet table for awhile and this one came in two days and made my day. It is exactly as the picture portrays it and sturdy. A beautiful piece of furniture for the money
customer_reviews.author: DeAnnon Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy piece of furniture, after my husband sorted through what seemed like 5000 pieces. I saw one similar to it at a local furniture store for $700, so glad I looked around. Extremely please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M Pule

customer_reviews.title: Great better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time, actually earlier than expected. Double boxed for protection & the instructions were clear & very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what we figured and wanted. Good quality and very sturdy. It was fairly easy to assemble. I would recommend this to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture that fits perfectly in my dining ...
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture that fits perfectly in my dining room. The color is a little darker than expected, but everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sodric Dira

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy, but it does take at least two people ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was packed very well. The instructions were easy, but it does take at least two people to assemble. But the finished product is all that i hoped for! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi M Huebl

customer_reviews.title: This looks good from a distance but up close it looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This looks good from a distance but up close it looks cheap. It was difficult to put together and we never could get the back legs on tight. We had to use our own hardware and tools to make it sturdy. It was definitely too expensive for what it actually is. It's too bad because it could be a really nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing I can say is that it had some scratches on top piece and also on the top of the lower piece which looked to be covered up with a marker that didn't exactly match the table color, but I sat decorations on top and no one will know. To much trouble to pack all the pieces back up and send back, but I will think twice before I order something coming from Furniture of America again.
customer_reviews.author: DDN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece for the price, easy to assemble. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: mark johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece
customer_reviews.text: Little dissappointed in quality. Putting it together was not too bad. Wish, for that price, it was a little better made. Other than that, I do like the piece
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Height is NOT 35"!!! More like 33". Very disappointed because I needed something closer to my 36" dining table. Plus we have 9' walls, so height was important to me. Assembly was easier with two people. Be aware that the instructions have NO words, just pictures. Now I just need to find something to add the inches that I lost out on because the dimensions are wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Kassara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture for the money! Takes some patience to put together but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Palazzola

customer_reviews.title: I've a very good choice buying this piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Match perfectly to my existing furniture, both in size and color. Solid construction material and easy to assemble. I hope it'll stay there for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: TVL

customer_reviews.title: Wine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! Love it love it love!!! Couldn't figure out how to add a photo but it's gorgeous. .can't say enough about it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: and looks great doing so
customer_reviews.text: The Buffett now doubles as our cocktail storage area, and looks great doing so. The assembly was a little difficult and at points required two people. Instructions were a little difficult to follow at times, as pieces weren't labeled quite as well as they could have been. One fault with the device is that the storage doors require a magnet to stay shut, and after assembly this magnet doesn't really meet the other metal on the door to keep it shut.
customer_reviews.author: FightinScots

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece of furniture. It was exactly what we were expecting. Not extremely high quality but definitely worth what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pitra

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions but good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the buffet. The instructions were AWFUL!!. For the price, its really nice and works well in my space.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: ... affordable but more expensive looking piece and it looks great in our dining room
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable but more expensive looking piece and it looks great in our dining room. My boyfriend usually curses and bangs around a lot while putting furniture together so I was prepared to vacate the premises but this one was pretty drama-free and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K

customer_reviews.title: love it - traditional and modern look at the same time
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bar. I had friends/family from all ages and they all loved it also. easy to put in and very beautiful. it changed the whole house. seems sturdy too. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a table like this online because you never know what you are going to get but I am very glad I did. The table sits right behind our dining room table and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: seanstacy1

customer_reviews.title: no instruction manual provided
customer_reviews.text: The kit did not come with an instruction manual, but the manufacturer was very helpful in providing me with an electronic copy today. I will update the review further once I have a chance to assemble it regarding the difficulty of assembly and appearance of the item once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name1

customer_reviews.title: Unit is Nice, Assembly is an Issue
customer_reviews.text: The completed unit is very nice. Assembly instructions and diagrams are poor. Weight of unit precludes one person assembly, this should be specified in product presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy, but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had quite a time assembling this because he instructions were not clear and I assembled some stuff out of order. Once assembled, the parts are not designed to be taken apart again to allow assembly in the correct order. Needless to say, this resulted in a big hooha and I ended up damaging the piece, putting two big gouges in the top, among other stuff. Once together, it looks nice and seems sturdy. Just be careful assembling it. The top has to go on before the last two legs go on.
customer_reviews.author: Otho Bludge

product_meta.title: ioHOMES Clyton Contemporary 2-Door Storage Cabinet Dining Buffet with One Open Shelf and Wine Bottle Slots, Dark Espresso
product_meta.description: Entertaining is a cinch with the initial lab Clayton dining Buffet. Contemporary in design, this buffet table combines a modern look with the fine tradition of dinner hosting. Useful features make this piece an outstanding addition to your living space. Fine hospitality furniture quite similar to the buffet table we know today first emerged in Europe in the 18th century. A selection of food items are laid on the buffet, urging guests to pick and choose to their liking. This dining format provides a friendly atmosphere, making dinner events even more enjoyable. The buffet table is also often used for storing fine China, silverware, dining linens, and miscellaneous dining articles. The initial lab Clayton dining Buffet offers numerous benefits for your hosting needs. A roomy table top provides ample room for service or display. An open shelf gives you more easily accessible storage or display space. A bottle rack can hold up to nine bottles of wine or spirits. Cabinets, adorned with metallic drawer handles, give you more room to store glasses, dishes, flatware, or linens. Wood finished in lustrous espresso gives this piece long-lasting quality.
feature_bullets: Great modern style dining buffet is perfect for any modern dining area with various storage spaces in a dark Espresso Finish
Product is Made of medium fiber Board construction; laminate Espresso Finish
2-Spacious compartments; overhang with round edges table Top panel; bottom compartment beneath table Top panel
Assembly required by two adults; to clean, use damp cotton cloth to wipe clean; Made in China
